content.en: Bivariate distributions: Researchers have investigated various properties and estimation procedures of different bivariate distributions in their studies. They have used the EM algorithm, a computational method, to estimate the unknown parameters of these distributions. The algorithm is employed to compute maximum likelihood estimators, which help in understanding the probabilistic properties and estimation techniques of these distributions.
content.da: Bivariate fordelinger: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige egenskaber og estimationsprocedurer af forskellige bivariate fordelinger i deres studier. De har anvendt EM-algoritmen, en beregningsmetode, til at estimere de ukendte parametre for disse fordelinger. Algoritmen bruges til at beregne maksimum likelihood-estimatorer, hvilket hjælper med at forstå de probabilistiske egenskaber og estimeringsteknikker for disse fordelinger.
